channel.title: Is there a mod that places snap points on belts?
channel.description: I am new to the game. It seems abnormal that when you place a splitter/merger on a belt that it does not snap to the same points that a stand would pop up under it when over a foundation. Am I missing something, or is there a mod that does this?

item.title: Is there a mod that places snap points on belts?
item.dc:creator: @challengebutter Challengebutter

I am new to the game. It seems abnormal that when you place a splitter/merger on a belt that it does not snap to the same points that a stand would pop up under it when over a foundation. Am I missing something, or is there a mod that does this?
